name: Spycraft: The Great Game
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC_single.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxSC.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
main_file: DOSBOX/dosboxSC_single.conf
